item.title: Why Convivial?
item.description: (This is part of the series L’Only Child Syndrome) An initiative I’m living in the void of time and space. I have arrived at a still point in life. As if I’m standing in front of this tranquil and magnificent palace. The exquisite details and lifelike reliefs marks its significance as a piece of artwork. A comprehension of mortality, hence immortality. I have always suspected my whole life that I am destined for this place.
